alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 2:48PM PST until December 12 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow possible. 3 to 8 inches for elevations above 5,000 feet, and 1 to 3 inches for elevations down to 3,500 feet. * WHERE...Interior Mountains of Los Angeles, Ventura, and Santa Barbara Counties. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Significant travel delays possible with accumulating snow on several mountain roads. This could include the Tejon Pass and Grapevine area of Interstate 5. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow accumulations are also expected earlier during the Saturday night into Sunday storm, but with snow levels well above 7,000 feet during that time, any accumulations will be isolated to the highest peaks.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
